thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to get a list of hyperlinks from a website.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting a list of hyperlinks from a website can help me quickly navigate to other pages or resources related to the website. It can also be a good way to practice my web scraping skills.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the get_hyperlinks command to get a list of hyperlinks from a website.
- Specify the URL of the website.
- Store the list of hyperlinks in a file for future reference.
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to violate any website's terms of service or use web scraping in an unethical way.
thoughts.speak: I would like to use the get_hyperlinks command to get a list of hyperlinks from a website. I will be careful not to violate any website's terms of service or use web scraping in an unethical way.
